description:
One less thing to put on, on less thing to weigh you down and one less thing wash. With their internal liner, the Limitless shorts simplify your running kit, while providing all the quick drying support you want.

  • Recycled polyester shorts have a non-PFC DWR finish that lets them shake off light rain and keeps them looking cleaner, longer
  • FlashDry™ improves wicking and further reduces drying times
  • Internal jersey knit brief liner made from a wicking recycled polyester blend
  • Elasticised waistband with internal drawcord for cinching in that just right fit
  • Rear zippered pocket gives you a place to stash your keys and a gel
  • Standard fit wears just like you hoped they would
name: The North Face Limitless Run Short - Men's
